testimonials.text: The foundation has impacted me positively. i have derived priceless educational, aesthetic and emotional benefits from visiting the lekki conservation center and experiencing the wildlife
testimonials.name: Dr. Charlotte Ndiribe
testimonials.title: Life Fellow

testimonials.text: Our responsible approach to protecting the environment has seen us partner with the Nigerian Conservation Foundation. Through its ongoing partnership with the NCF, First Bank ( a subsidary of the FBN) supports activities promoting the conservation of wildlife and biodiversity
testimonials.name: UK Eke ( MFR )  GMD FBN Holdings
testimonials.title: Gold Corporate Member

testimonials.text: In Line with Cheveron’s commitment to environmental stewardshipm we partner with Nigerian Conservation Foundation ( NCF ) to create awareness, promote nature conservation and sustainable environmental management for the protection of Nigeria’s biological resources
testimonials.name: Jeff Ewing - Chairman/MD Cheveron Nigeria Limited
testimonials.title: Gold Coporate Member
